      • encrypt

        public java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String m,
                                java.lang.String key)
        Processes the plaintext message by splitting it into 64bit blocks and encrypts it.
        Parameters:
        m - the message as an ASCII string.
        key - the key used to encrypt the message "m".
        Returns:
        the encrypted message as a HEX string.

      • binaryToHex

        public java.lang.String binaryToHex(java.lang.String encryptBin)
        Converts a binary String into a Hex String.
        Parameters:
        encryptBin - the binary String to be converted.
        Returns:
        the converted hex String.

      • encryptBin

        public java.lang.String encryptBin(java.lang.String m,
                                   java.lang.String key)
        Encrypts a 64bit message using a 64bit DES key.
        Parameters:
        m - the message that will be encrypted.
        key - the 64bit DES key used to encrypt the message.
        Returns:
        the ciphertext once encrypted.

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String ciphertext,
                                java.lang.String key)
        Processes the ciphertext by converting the ciphertext from hexidecimal to binary and then decrypts the binary ciphertext.
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - the hexidecimal ciphertext string.
        key - the key used to decrypt the ciphertext.
        Returns:
        the decrypted plaintext as an ASCII string.

      • hexToAscii

        public java.lang.String hexToAscii(java.lang.String hex)
        Converts a hexidecimal string to ASCII.
        Parameters:
        hex - the hexidecimal string to be converted.
        Returns:
        the ASCII string once converted.

      • decryptBin

        public java.lang.String decryptBin(java.lang.String ciphertext,
                                   java.lang.String key)
        Decrypts a 64bit ciphertext using a 64bit DES key.
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - the 64 bit ciphertext to be decrypted.
        key - the 64bit DES key used to decrypt the message.
        Returns:
        the plaintext once decrypted.

      • ipPermutation

        public java.lang.String ipPermutation(java.lang.String rlInverse)
        Applies the final permutation as defined by the table "ipInverseTable".
        Parameters:
        rlInverse - the result of R16 + L16.
        Returns:
        the binary string after permutation.

      • function

        public java.lang.String function(java.lang.String r,
                                 java.lang.String subKey)
        Calculates the function f which is used 16 times to calculate L16 and R16.
        Parameters:
        r - the Ri value used to calculate f.
        subKey - the subkey used to calculate f.
        Returns:
        the result of the permutation defined by the table "selectionTable".

      • permutationP

        public java.lang.String permutationP(java.lang.String sb)
        Yields a 32bit output from a 32bit input by permuating the bits of the input block using the permutation table.
        Parameters:
        sb - the 32bits used in the permutation.
        Returns:
        the the 32bit output after permutation.

      • sboxes

        public java.lang.String sboxes(java.lang.String[] kerArray)
        Returns a permutation of a 48bit number represented as an array of eight 6bit binary strings. The output is used to calculate f.
        Parameters:
        kerArray - the array of eight 6bit binary strings.
        Returns:
        the 32bit output after permutation.

      • xor

        public java.lang.String xor(java.lang.String a,
                            java.lang.String b)
        Calculates logical XOR of two binary strings.
        Parameters:
        a - the first binary value.
        b - the second binary value.
        Returns:
        the result as a binary String.

      • genKey

        public java.lang.String genKey()
        Generates a random DES key in HEX.
        Returns:
        the generated DES key.
